devdoc.author: NFTfi
devdoc.details: Registry for airdropa supported by NFTfi. Each Airdrop is associated with a boolean permit.

params.selector: - The selector of the permitted function in the `airdropContract`.

params._airdopContracts: - The batch of airdrop contract addresses initially permitted.
params._selectors: - The batch of selector of the permitted functions for each `_airdopContracts`.

params._addressSel: - The address of the airdrop contract + function selector.

returns._0: Returns whether the airdrop is permitted

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._airdropContract: - The address of airdrop contract whose permit list status changed.
params._permit: - The new status of whether the airdrop is permitted or not.
params._selector: - The selector of the permitted function whose permit list status changed.

params._airdropContracts: - The addresses of the airdrop contracts whose permit list status changed.
params._permits: - The new statuses of whether the airdrop is permitted or not.
params._selectors: - the selector of the permitted functions for each airdop whose permit list status changed.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: PermittedAirdrops

AirdropPermit(address,bytes4,bool).notice: This event is fired whenever the admin sets a ERC20 permit.

constructor.notice: Initialize `airdropPermits` with a batch of permitted airdops

isValidAirdrop(bytes).notice: This function can be called by anyone to get the permit associated with the airdrop.

setAirdroptPermit(address,bytes4,bool).notice: This function can be called by admins to change the permitted status of an airdrop. This includes both adding an airdrop to the permitted list and removing it.

setAirdroptPermits(address[],bytes4[],bo.notice: This function can be called by admins to change the permitted status of a batch of airdrops. This includes both adding an airdop to the permitted list and removing it.
